item.title: Simple blog api using python flask and markdown
item.description: I have a blog generated by Hugo, and I require access to its content through a REST API. Due to Hugo’s nature as a static site generator and not a server, it lacks a native feature for exposing a REST API. Upon further investigation, I found that I can develop a Python script using the Flask framework to create a JSON-compatible REST API for accessing my blog’s content. While it may seem unconventional to use Flask instead of generating a JSON file directly in Hugo, I view this as an opportunity to enhance my proficiency in Python.
